sub_title: Brand Licensing Management l Product Owner | Sr. Mgr - Digital Marketing and E-commerce
summary:
+10 years experience in digital and eCommerce marketing at multinational corporation and leading agency. Strong combination of digital expertise, organizational capability-building and business/market management (downstream) capabilities. Thought leadership, agile practioner, certified scrum master, team motivator, result driver. 

Specialties: E-Commerce marketing, Online channel content strategy, process, solution deployment; A/B multi-variant testing, conversion optimization, data analytics, Digital marketing, Digital campaign development,  Social Commerce; Project management, Strategy & process deployment, Market management, Coaching and organizational capability building.

Highly-focused and performance driven
Strategic and creative thinking with consumer-centric mindset
Strong leadership, multi-functional and interpersonal communication skills
Strong team player

profile_positions.title: Product Owner | Sr. Mgr - Digital Marketing and E-commerce

profile_positions.description:
Lead organizational capability building of online retailer content excellence cross all Philips Personal health product categories and markets worldwide.

Defined and deployed e-commerce content strategy, processes, KPIs. Enabled multiple solutions to achieve best go-to-market efficiency, content coverage, quality and on-timeness across online sales channels worldwide. Program coverage/value by 2016 : + 580,000  product pages on 410 retailer channels in + 50 countries, +100 million page views (73% YoY growth), continuous growth of incremental online sales (+51% YoY)

Lead content testing and optimization program delivering continuous quality improvement and conversion uplift. Program coverage/value by 2016: + 100,000 product pages cross +250 retailer sites,delivered 8-10% increase in ATC  rate , est. +10,000 incremental sales unit, + 600,000 incremental revenue, improved organizational Content Creation Guideline and Scope.

Product owner of Amazon content development platform responsible for strategic road map, full development cycle, market roll out and organizational activation.

Product owner and lead of product deployment of in-house-built online merchandising measurement tool. Tool deployment by 2016: Activated in 28 countries, measuring KPIs of + 150 online sales channels. Optimal ROI and organizational scale-ability compared to external alternatives.

Owner and global trainer of eTrade capability in the organizational digital transformation program. Delivered coaching, workshop and capability-building session in multiple markets cross Asian, European, North & South American, Middle east and African region. Continuous drive capability deployment in the markets with proven results. 

Initiate and lead acceleration programs for particular markets (e.g India, BNL) and major retailer channels (e.g. Amazon, Bol); Establish collaborative partnership between global, local and customer team to maximize program deployment potential and value-gain.
profile_positions.title: Global eCommerce Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Managed online communication projects for Business Group Lifestyle Entertainment 

Created online presence of various product categories with visible success such as: 

Drove seamless integration of offline campaign into web experience for category MP3 & MP4 in APAC markets. Increased online conversion rate by 5pt (YoY). 

Revamped online presence for category Speech Processing. Increased page view by 60% and online conversion rate by 4pt (YoY). Saved 40% cost through smart asset management. Initiated incentive program for consumer registration with an estimated 25% increase in consumer registration. 

Initiated cross-category asset integration between category Blu-ray & DVD player and TV. Improved consistency of consumer online experience. Allowed 60% budget saving on asset production. 

Developed effective web-page for Home Phone category targeting multi-objectives including: immediate access to product benefits; consumer engagement; persuasion and branding. Challenged the corporate standard template by strong consumer insights; deployed a new solution deliverying higher performance.

Developed a fully integrated online presence for Home Entertainment Accessories categories to elevate the overall category value proposition, provide effective product selection support to consumers (cable shoppers in particular), drive conversion and cross-sell potential.

Led the 1st “out-side-in” categorization study to improve the categorization of Accessories category from consumer point of view. The two-round study covered 4 markets (DE, US, NK, CN) with 80 consumers from each market.

Developed a high level online presence for headphone category to strengthen brand positioning, drive consumer engagement and like-ness to the product rang and influence purchase intend. – Project nominated by the web design award “aWWWards”.

Initiated improvement proposal for the merchandizing tab of Philips Sound Facebook platform.
profile_positions.title: Global Digital Campaign Manager

profile_positions.description:
Developed communication and working process between the global online team and various stakeholders within the organization (upstream with Business Groups and the Marketing Communication Team; downstream with the Local Online Management Team in key markets) resulting in efficient information flow and effective cross-function cooperation. Enhanced performance for multiple projects.

Developed communication tools and initiated various digital stakeholder engagement programs. Greatly enhanced the simplicity and efficiency of the communication process and achieved 87% NPS score of the country engagement program.

Developed activation program (video competition) for Philips' online video platform resulting in high-quality user-generated-content and passionate brand ambassadors.

Managed incentive program for Philips' online video platform  

Established and managed Philips official YouTube channel

Supported Planning & Strategy director in developing social media strategy:
          o Compiled report on Philips’ social media presence worldwide
          o Drafted social media guidelines for marketers and employees
profile_positions.title: Assistant Planning and Strategy - Global Digital

profile_positions.description:
Worked directly with account director on marketing & consumer research, strategy formulation, client presentation, project planning and execution.

Developed and maintained great relationship with clients and contributed to the generation of new business opportunities.

Key Clients & Projects:
Philips Consumer Lifestyle (Greater China) – Integrated Online Marketing Platform Development & Activation. website URL: www.philips.com.cn/mylife

L’Oreal Group (China) – Biotherm China CRM Consulting & Program Management

Ebay (Eachnet) – Paypal China Online Branding and Promotion Campaign

Shanghai Forrester Development Ltd - DaNing “Life Hub” International Business Zone Website Development and Promotion Campaign. Website URL: www.daningdaning.com

Bosideng Corporate Website Development. Website URL: http://www.bosideng.com

Bayer (China)– Material Science Markrolon Chinese Brand Website
